mapper.select: /* 피드 상세 조회 */ SELECT f.feed_sn, f.wrtr_user_no, f.feed_cn, f.crt_dt, u.user_no, u.user_ncnm, up.prfl_img, fi.feed_img_sn, fi.img_file_path_nm, fi.feed_img_sort_sn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_interactions fi2 WHERE fi2.feed_sn = f.feed_sn AND fi2.intract_type_cd = 'LIKE') AS like_count FROM feeds f LEFT JOIN users u ON f.wrtr_user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN user_profiles up ON u.user_no = up.user_no LEFT JOIN feed_images fi ON f.feed_sn = fi.feed_sn WHERE f.feed_sn = #{feedSn} ORDER BY fi.feed_img_sort_sn ASC

/* 피드 목록 조회를 위한 갯수 조회 (통합) */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feeds f WHERE f.del_dt IS NULL
AND f.wrtr_user_no = #{userNo}
